mapper.sql: rid, ruid, rcontent, rimgurl, rnumber, rcount, rzan
mapper.select: SELECT cu.uname, cu.content FROM t_communitydetail cd inner join t_user u on u.uid = cd.uid inner join (SELECT c.ruid ,u.uname, c.content, c.uid, c.cmid FROM t_user u inner join t_comment c on u.uid = c.ruid) cu on cu.uid = u.uid AND cu.cmid = cd.id WHERE cd.uid = #{uid} and cd.id = #{id} ORDER BY cd.id desc LIMIT 3;
